long_description: Apply pressure with the ball by using the floor, wall or any hard surface; to achieve deep muscle massage, apply pressure for 5 - 7 sec. without movement. Trigger Point Performance Massage ball works great for minor aches and pains in your neck, shoulders, back, chest and calves. Use the Trigger Point Performance Massage ball to help relieve minor aches and pains in your muscles.
short_description: Apply pressure with the ball by using the floor, wall or any hard surface; to achieve deep muscle massage, apply pressure for 5 - 7 sec. without movement.
